sources.title: The Oregon Trail (1959)
sources.description: In 1846, a reporter for the New York Herald joins a wagon train bound for the Oregon Territory. He hopes to confirm a rumor that President Polk is sending in soldiers disguised as settlers in order to strengthen American claims to the Territory. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-oregon-trail-1959/

metadata.Plot: In 1846, a reporter for the New York Herald joins a wagon train bound for the Oregon Territory. He hopes to confirm a rumor that President Polk is sending in soldiers disguised as settlers in order to strengthen American claims to the Territory.
metadata.Actors: Fred MacMurray, William Bishop, Nina Shipman
